skillTree.localised_description: As one of the most talented Dwarf Engineers, Sven always carries his tool box with the most advanced equipment.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +25% for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This famous rune hammer was forged by Guildmaster Burlok Damminsson, once a close friend of The Magnificent Sven. It is inscribed with a Rune of Cleaving and a Master Rune of Smiting.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Sven's rune helm is inscribed with the Rune of the Furnace, making him immune to heat and fire.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.
A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There were two types of Dwarf Engineers in the old world: Sven, and all the rest.

effects.description: [needs replacing] Enemy siege holdout time: -3 (minimum 1 turn)

Construction time: -50% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs never lose sight of the importance of defensive deployments, especially in the dangerous jungles and coasts of Lustria.

skillTree.localised_description: The Spine of Sotek Dwarfs have long been in conflict with the surrounding Greenskins and Skaven clans, and now Sven's expedition will lead them to clean up those inferior creatures. Of course, the more important reason is that the treasures are buried under the mines they occupy.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Greenskins, Ogres and Skaven

Leadership: +5 when fighting against Greenskins, Ogres and Skaven
	(Lord's army)
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Ogres and Skaven

Leadership: +10 when fighting against Greenskins, Ogres and Skaven
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sven is an adventurous Dwarf, who travels far and wide whenever he is away from his many workshops. He can be encountered in almost any location and circumstance, except in a Dwarf Hold.

It is rumored that there are countless treasures in the mainland of Lustia. Although Sven decided to lead the Spine of Sotek Dwarfs back to the Old World, they were still reluctant to leave such wonders behind.

effects.description: Income from sacking and looting settlements: +15%
Income from sacking and looting settlements: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarf Engineers are intellectuals with immense creativity and imagination, but none has been as talented as The Magnificent Sven.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

skillTree.localised_description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Sven Hasselfiresian, also known as the Magnificent Sven, is a near-legendary renegade Dwarf engineer. After he was exiled, he led expeditions to plunder the treasure-houses of the Lizardmen in Lustria and other exotic corners of the world. When his expedition reached the south of Itza, he discovered the settlements of the Spine of Sotek Dwarfs. He decided to lead these Dwarfs back to the Old World.

items.colour_text: As one of the most talented Dwarf Engineers, Sven always carries his tool box with the most advanced equipment.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sven Hasselfriesian, also known as The Magnificent Sven, is a legendary Dwarf Engineer whose curiosity and innovation is unmatched. Exiled from the guild for his dangerous experimentation, he currently leads expeditions to plunder treasure in the exotic corners of the world.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Dwarf Warriors and Dwarf artillery units
	(Lord's army)
